modName: No Sneak Eye and No red dots on Compass
summary: Removes the 'Sneak Eye' from the in-game HUD and enemy indicators from the Compass
descriptionHtml:
Removes the 'Sneak Eye' from the in-game HUD and enemy indicators from the Compass.

I created this mod by myself in order to make the gameplay more thrilling and realistic.

The mod was successfully tested in Skyrim: Legendary Edition (Steam version) with SkyUI.

[b]Install:[/b] Unpack to the main [i]Skyrim[/i] folder.

[b]Uninstall:[/b] Delete the folder [i]Exported[/i] from [i]Skyrim\Data\Interface\.[/i]
author: SkyValley94

files.name: No Sneak Eye and No Red Dots by SkyValley94
files.fileName: No Sneak Eye and No red dots on Compass-79547-1-0.rar
